description: Try our easy to follow Crispy Prawn And Asparagus Wontons recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Crispy Prawn And Asparagus Wontons Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 long red chilli, deseeded, finely chopped (for dipping sauce)
0.33 cup salt reduced light soy sauce (for dipping sauce)

recipeInstructions.text: For dipping sauce, combine all ingredients in a bowl and set aside.
Finely chop prawn meat and combine in a bowl with onion, soy, ginger and garlic.
Thinly slice asparagus, add to prawn mixture and mix well.

Place eight gow gee pastry squares on a clean work surface. Place 2 tsp of filling in the centre of each square. Brush edges with egg and fold in half to make a triangle, pressing out air. Pinch edges to seal. Fold bottom 2 corners together and press to join.
Pour enough oil into a wok or saucepan to come half way up the side. Heat over high heat. Cook wontons, in batches, for 3-4 minutes or until cooked through and golden brown. Drain on paper towel.
Serve immediately with dipping sauce on the side.
